title: I owned a Google Nexus 5x , it's out of warranty and stucked in bootloop now it's reboot in every 5m
content: I owned a Google nexus 5x. After using it for 8 month's I did a software update and it stucked in bootloop. Now its out of warranty it stucked in rebooting. It reebots in after 5 , 10 min. Of usage.
